Fundamental Theorem of Caculus

$$
    \int_a^b f'(x) \, dx = f(b) - f(a)
    $$

> Thm: Multiple Lines Theorem

$$
\begin{align*}
&ax^2+bx+c = 0 \\ 
&x = \frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}
\end{align*}
$$
